EmailTemplate.name: Operational Notices.Social Security Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Social Security Notice from MBO Partners
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, This week, President Obama signed the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012 (better known as the “Fiscal Cliff Bill”) into law. Among other things, the Act eliminates the 2% reduction in employee-side Social Security tax that had been in place during 2011 and 2012. As a result, your 2013 Social Security tax liability will increase by 2% to its pre-2011 level. Also note that the 2013 Social Security wage base limit has increased to $113,700. This means that MBO Partners will withhold Social Security tax on the first $113,700 of your 2013 billings. Please let me know if you have any questions. Best regards, ___________________________________ {{company.BM FName:default=Kelly}} {{company.BM LName:default=Marshall}} Business Manager MBO Partners
t: {{company.BM Phone:default=703-793-6000}} e: {{company.BM Email:default=info@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
